properties.body:
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY BY M/V HAWK EXPLORER
   TOWING 5.4 MILE LONG CABLES:
   A. IN PROGRESS ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      06-42N 049-07W AND 05-09N 050-27W.
   B. 24 APR IN ALONG TRACKLINE BETWEEN
      06-05N 049-46W AND 05-12N 050-32W.
   C. 25 AND 26 APR IN AREA BOUND BY
      05-58N 049-38W, 05-54N 049-34W,
      05-03N 050-18W, 05-06N 050-23W.
   D. 27 APR IN AREA BOUND BY
      05-54N 049-34W, 05-47N 049-26W,
      04-56N 050-10W, 05-03N 050-18W.
   SEVEN MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 28 APR.
